description:
We are seeking an experienced and enthusiastic Manager, Sales Programs to join the Salesforce team and drive our sales programs strategy. As part of the Salesforce team, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and managing sales programs that drive sales productivity, efficiency, and effectiveness. We’re looking for an innovative leader who can bring fresh ideas and insights to the table. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience in sales, preferably in the technology industry, coupled with a proven track record of managing complex sales programs. You should have exceptional interpersonal skills and the ability to effectively communicate with all levels of the organization. You should also possess strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a customer-oriented focus and excellent organizational skills. If you’re looking for an opportunity to make a real impact, this is the role for you!

Responsibilities:
Develop and manage sales programs that drive sales productivity, efficiency, and effectiveness
Analyze existing sales programs and recommend improvements
Create and implement strategies to increase sales performance
Design and develop sales training programs for new and existing employees
Monitor sales program performance and develop strategies to optimize results
Establish and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and customers
Prepare and present reports on sales program performance
Remain up-to-date on sales trends and best practices
Manage the budget for sales program initiatives
Lead and mentor the sales team to ensure high performance

Salesforce is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
